inline_content.Text: To create a XML using DOMDocument,basically, we need to create all the tags and attributes using the
methods and them create the XML structure with the

title: The example below includes tags, attributes, a CDATA section and a different namespace for the second tag:

inline_content.Text: The example below includes tags, attributes, a CDATA section and a different namespace for the second tag:

title: This will output the following XML:

inline_content.Text: This will output the following XML:

title:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<books xmlns:ns="www.example.com/libraryns/1.0">
  <book>
    <name>PHP - An Introduction</name>
    <price>$5.95</price>
    <id version="1.0">1</id>
  </book>
  <ns:book>
    <ns:name><![CDATA[PHP - Advanced]]></ns:name>
    <ns:price>$25.00</ns:price>
    <ns:id>2</ns:id>
  </ns:book>
</books>

content_resolved.code:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<books xmlns:ns="www.example.com/libraryns/1.0">
  <book>
    <name>PHP - An Introduction</name>
    <price>$5.95</price>
    <id version="1.0">1</id>
  </book>
  <ns:book>
    <ns:name><![CDATA[PHP - Advanced]]></ns:name>
    <ns:price>$25.00</ns:price>
    <ns:id>2</ns:id>
  </ns:book>
</books>
